full_summary:
# Tree Removal Services - Request for Standing Offer

## Overview

The National Capital Commission (NCC) is issuing a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Tree Removal Services to support the commission's long-term planning and stewardship of federal lands within the National Capital Region.

## Objectives

The NCC seeks to retain up to four (4) Standing Offer Agreements (SOAs) with successful contractors for the provision of tree removal services on an "as and when requested" basis. These services will be required at various locations within the National Capital Region, including Ottawa, Ontario and Quebec.

## Key Requirements

*   Contractors must enter into a formal NCC Standing Offer Agreement (SOA) upon award.
*   SOAs will be active for a maximum of four (4) years or until the total expenditure level is attained, whichever comes first.
*   The NCC reserves the right to award one (1) to four (4) SOAs.

## Enquiries and Contact Information

Enquiries relating to this RFSO must be submitted in writing via email to Sr. Contract Officer, Emilie Scheckman at emilie.scheckman@ncc-ccn.ca. All enquiries must be received no later than five (5) calendar days prior to the tender closing date.

## Important Notice

The procurement process is subject to trade agreements as listed below. The official Government Electronic Tendering Service website is [Tender Opportunities | CanadaBuys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/). It is the bidder's responsibility to ensure they have received all posted tender information to ensure tender compliance and avoid disqualification.

## Trade Agreements

The procurement process is covered by the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement

## Tender Information

### Tender Identification

*   RFSO Title: Tree Removal Services
*   Solicitation Number: ES033
*   Contracting Entity: National Capital Commission
*
